tips: Take deep breaths and practice mindfulness.
Go for a short walk to clear your mind.
Listen to calming music or nature sounds.
Try grounding techniques like the 5-4-3-2-1 method.
Write down your worries to gain perspective.
Set small, achievable goals to stay motivated.
Surround yourself with positive and supportive people.
Remind yourself of past successes and how you overcame challenges.
